mi:PackageInformation.name: Composite.News
mi:PackageInformation.author: Composite A/S
mi:PackageInformation.Description: Allows visitors to read the latest news on a website. Supports a news archive and export to RSS.
mi:PackageInformation.TechnicalDetails: Stores news items in a page data folder added to a page via the News application. Implements news teasers and news list as Razor functions. The news list function presents all the news (list) or the content of a selected news item (details).
